subject: Dear, Matthew
body:
Dear, Matthew

Thanks for your quick response towards my mail as a partner to share the
$6.5Million 50/50, I am Mr. Martins Izuogbe and I work with Polaris Bank
Limited And there are some parts of money taken by some old politicians
that were forced out of power, and I am in procession to bring someone who
will claim the $6.5Million as the rightful beneficiary.

I will pay my lawyer to change the account details to yours, and apply for
an ATM visa card with your details in the bank, they will send the visa
card to you and you will withdraw money with it and send my own percentage
of the money. And concerning the Shipment fee both of us will share it into
two (2) parts because I am the person who will pay the lawyer with my money
to secure those necessary documents related to the $6.5Million in your name.

I want you to be honest to me because when you receive the total
$6.5Million, you will send 50% to me and take 50%, remove every doubt and
fear and act accordingly and don't let anyone deceive or dissuade you from
this once in a lifetime opportunity, because this $6.5Million is part of
money taken by some old politicians that was forced out of power.

Your name................
Address..................
Age......................
Sex......................
Country..................
Occupation...............
Phone number.............

Best Regards.
Mr. Martins Izuogbe
+23470-85-706-485

subject: Re: Dear, Matthew
body:
Hello Mr. Martins Izuogbe,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite an interesting proposition you've presented here. I must admit, it's not something I come across every day.

I'm curious about a few things though. How did you come across my contact information? And why have you chosen me for this particular task? 

Also, could you please provide more details about the process of changing the account details and applying for an ATM visa card? Is there any specific reason we are using this method?

I appreciate your trust in me and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Dear, Matthew
body:
Dear, Matthew

I Came Through Your Contact Through Email Directives And My Spirit Accepted
Direct Me To Contact You For The Claimed.

These Are Some Parts Of Money Taken Old Politicians That Were Forced Out Of
Power, And I Am In Procession To Bring Someone Who Will Claim The
$6.5Million As The Rightful Beneficiary.

Once I Receive Your Information I Will Forward It To The Lawyer To Change
The Account Details To Yours, And Apply For An ATM Visa Card With Your
Details In The Bank. And Concerning The Shipment Fee Both Of Us Will Share
It Into Two (2) Parts Because I Am The Person Who Will Pay The Lawyer With
My Money To Secure Those Necessary Documents Related To The $6.5Million In
Your Name.

Be Rest Assured That Funds Will Been Issued and Loaded Into An ATM Card In
Your Name. Remove Every Doubt And Fear And Act Accordingly And See How You
Will Smile And Reward Me Thereafter. Don't Let Anyone Deceive Or Dissuade
You From This Once In A LifeTime Opportunity. Know That This Is 100% Risk
Free Because All The Necessary Approvals And Documents To The Payment Will
Be Secured In Your Name By The Lawyer.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Best Regards.
Mr. Martins Izuogbe
+23470-85-706-485

subject: Re: Dear, Matthew
body:
Hello Mr. Martins Izuogbe,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. It's quite an interesting proposition, I must say! 

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please explain more about the process? How does it work exactly? And what kind of documents are we talking about here?

Also, could you tell me more about yourself? How did you come across my contact information?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: Dear, Matthew
body:
Hello Mr. Martins Izuogbe,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this intriguing opportunity. It's not every day that one receives such an interesting proposal.

I must admit, I'm a bit confused about some of the details. Could you please clarify what exactly is being claimed? And who was it that was forced out of power?

Also, could you explain more about the process of changing the account details and applying for an ATM Visa Card? How does this work and why is it necessary?

Lastly, regarding the shipment fee, how much are we talking about here? And how would we go about sharing it?

I appreciate your patience in answering my questions. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Dear, Matthew
body:
Dear, Matthew

Acknowledge The Receipt Of Your Mail And Question. This $6,500,000.00 Is
Unclaimed Fund In Polaris Bank And Is A Part Of The Money Taken From Old
Politicians That Were Forced Out Of Power And I Am Account Officer To The
Unclaimed Fund And Also Procession To Bring Someone Who Will Claim The
$6.5Million As The Rightful Beneficiary..

(1)And What Kind Of Documents Are We Talking About Here?
The Lawyer Will Swear An Affidavit And Court OATH In Your Name As The
Rightful Beneficiary Of The Unclaimed Fund and submit it to the Bank for
claim as the Rightful Beneficiary Of The Unclaimed.

(2)Also, Could You Tell Me More About Yourself?
I Am Mr. Martins Izuogbe And I Work With Polaris Bank Limited And Married
With Three (3) Children And A Christian .

(3)How Did You Come Across My Contact Information?
I Got Your Details From Email Directory And I Decided To Contact You After
Much Prayer For A God Fearing Person That Will Not Fail Me.

(4)Also, could you explain more about the process of changing the account
details and applying for an ATM Visa Card?
After the lawyer has sworn an affidavit in your name and submit the
documents To The Bank for the claim of the $6,500,000.00 through ATM card.

(5) How does this work and why is it necessary?
The House I owned today was bought in the same pattern as I contacted you
to act as the rightful beneficiary of the $6,500,000.00 that floating is
Access Bank Plc as unclaimed Fund.

(6)I Must Admit, I'm A Bit Confused About Some of the Details. Could You
Please Clarify What Exactly Is Being Claimed? And Who Was It That Was
Forced Out Of Power?
With Your Details The Lawyer Will Secure All The Necessary Documents Need
By The Bank To Claim The $6,500.000.00.And If My Message Doesn't Exit
People Will Not Be Contacting You For The Claimed.

(7) Lastly, regarding the shipment fee, how much are we talking about here?
And how would we go about sharing it?
For The Shipment Fee, I Have Made And Required From The Lawyer And
According To Him It Will Cost $620 For Shipment And Insurance Fees of The
ATM Card to your doorstep.

(8)And How Would We Go About Sharing It?
We Are Going To Share The Shipment Fee Into (2) Parts $310 / $310 for Each
Person. Because The Lawyer Is Demanded $2,500 For His Services Charges And
I will Be The One That Will Pay The Lawyer.

(9)Finally This Transaction Will Not Take Us Five (5) Working Day
Immediately I Forward Your Information To The Lawyer To Secure All The
Necessary Documents Need By The Bank For The Claim.

Thanks For Your Understanding As I Wait For Your Information.

Best Regards.
Mr. Martins Izuogbe
+23470-85-706-485

subject: Re: Dear, Matthew
body:
Dear Mr. Martins Izuogbe,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite an interesting situation, isn't it? 

I'm curious about the process of claiming this unclaimed fund. You mentioned that a lawyer will swear an affidavit in my name and submit it to the bank. Could you please elaborate on this? What kind of information would be needed from me for this?

Also, you mentioned that the house owned today was bought in the same pattern as contacted me to act as the rightful owner of the fund that is floating in Access Bank Plc as unclaimed Fund. Could you explain more about this pattern? How does it work exactly?

Regarding the shipment fee, I understand that we are going to share it into parts for each person and I will be paying for the lawyer's services charges. Can you provide a breakdown of these costs? And how should I make this payment?

Lastly, could you tell me more about yourself? You mentioned that you work with Polaris Bank Limited and have three children. What do you like to do in your free time?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: Dear, Matthew
body:
Dear Mr. Martins Izuogbe,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite an interesting situation, isn't it? 

I'm curious about the process of claiming this unclaimed fund. How does the lawyer go about swearing an affidavit in my name? Is there a specific court where this is done?

Also, you mentioned that the house you own was bought in a similar pattern. Could you elaborate on that? I'm just trying to understand how all of this works.

Regarding the shipment fee, could you clarify how much each person would need to contribute? And how do we ensure that everyone pays their fair share?

Lastly, once all the necessary documents are secured by the lawyer and submitted to the bank, what happens next? How long does it usually take for the bank to process everything?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Dear, Matthew
body:
Dear, Matthew

(1) You Mentioned That A Lawyer Will Swear An Affidavit In My Name And
Submit It To The Bank. Could You Please Elaborate On This? What Kind Of
Information Would Be Needed From Me For This?
The Information the Lawyer Needed To Secure All the Necessary Are Below,
Your Name................
Address..................
Age......................
Sex......................
Country..................
Occupation...............
Phone Number.............

(2)Also, You Mentioned That The House Owned Today Was Bought In The Same
Pattern As Contacted Me To Act As The Rightful Owner Of The Fund That Is
Floating In Access Bank Plc As Unclaimed Fund. Could You Explain More About
This Pattern? How Does It Work Exactly?
When I Was Working In Access Bank Plc In International Remittance
Department 10 years Ago Before I Left To Polaris Bank, Similar Opportunity
Came And I Involved Mr. Carl Wilson From New York USA Through Email
Directory And He Claim The $4,800,000.00 And Both Of Us Share It Into Two
(2) Parts But Mr. Carl Wilson Cheat Me By Sending Me 35% For My Share
Instead Of 50%.

(3)Regarding The Shipment Fee, I Understand That We Are Going To Share It
Into Parts For Each Person And I Will Be Paying For The Lawyer's Services
Charges. Can You Provide A Breakdown Of These Costs? And How Should I Make
This Payment?
The Shipment Fees It Will Be Divided Into Two (2) Part And We Are Sending
It To The Lawyer Who Will Pay It To The Bank On Our Behalf As Our Lawyer.
For The Lawyer Services Charges Is Demanded $2,500, I Will Pay Him 70% For
The Require Charges And If You Are Willing To Assist You Are Free To Help
With Any Amount To Support And Pay The Lawyer.

(4)Lastly, Could You Tell Me More About Yourself? You Mentioned That You
Work With Polaris Bank Limited And Have Three Children. What Do You Like To
Do In Your Free Time?
I Use My Free Time To Call My Family To Know How They Are Doing Because
they are My First Priority Before Any Other Thing.

(5)Lastly, Once All The Necessary Documents Are Secured By The Lawyer And
Submitted To The Bank, What Happens Next?? How Long Does It Usually Take
For The Bank To Process Everything?
The Bank Will Contact You For The Claim As The Beneficiary Of The Fund
After Going Through Those Documents Secure In Your Name By The Lawyer.  It
Will Take the Bank Someday To Process the Fund and Send To You through ATM
Card and Also Depend Your Response to the Bank.

Thanks For Your Understanding As I Wait For Your Information.

Best Regards.
Mr. Martins Izuogbe
+23470-85-706-485

subject: Re: Dear, Matthew
body:
Hello Mr. Martins Izuogbe,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's interesting to hear about the process involved in claiming the fund. 

You mentioned that a lawyer will swear an affidavit in my name and submit it to the bank. Could you please explain more about this? What kind of information would be needed from me for this?

Also, I'm curious about the pattern you mentioned regarding how the house was bought. How does this relate to acting as the rightful owner of the unclaimed fund? 

I understand that there are some fees involved, such as shipment fees and lawyer's service charges. Could you provide a breakdown of these costs? And how should I make this payment?

It's nice to hear that you value your family so much! In your free time, besides calling your family, do you have any hobbies or interests?

Lastly, once all necessary documents are secured by the lawyer and submitted to the bank, what happens next? How long does it usually take for the bank to process everything?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: Dear, Matthew
body:
Dear Mr. Martins Izuogbe,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's interesting to hear about the process involved in claiming the fund. 

You mentioned that a lawyer will swear an affidavit in my name and submit it to the bank. Could you please explain more about this? What kind of information would be needed from me for this?

Also, I'm curious about the pattern you mentioned regarding how the house was bought. How does this relate to acting as the rightful owner of the unclaimed fund? 

I understand that similar situations have occurred before, like with Mr. Carl Wilson from New York USA. Could you share more details about these past experiences?

Regarding the shipment fee and lawyer's services charges, could you provide a breakdown of these costs? Also, how should I make this payment? Is there a specific method preferred by the lawyer or bank?

It's nice to hear that your family is your first priority during your free time. Family is indeed important.

Lastly, once all necessary documents are secured by the lawyer and submitted to the bank, what happens next? How long does it usually take for the bank to process everything?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Matthew
